long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Website Blocker: Your Personal Web Blocker
🔒 100% Privacy-Minded
🚫 Instant Website Blocking
🌐 Take Control of Your Web Experience

Why Website Blocker?

Tired of distractions, unwanted content, or just need to focus? Website Blocker is designed for you. Unlike other extensions that track your browsing habits, Website Blocker takes a strict stance on privacy: it doesn't track anything you do. Period.

Key Features

🔒 Privacy-Centric:
We respect your privacy. Website Blocker operates 100% locally on your machine. No data leaves your browser, ensuring your browsing habits stay your own.

🚫 Instant Blocking:
Add websites to your block list and Website Blocker takes care of the rest. As soon as you navigate to a blocked site, the tab will automatically close, no questions asked.

📝 Simple Interface:
An intuitive and straightforward interface makes managing your block list a breeze.


How to Use

Install: Click on the "Add to Chrome" button to install Website Blocker.
Navigate: Click on the Website Blocker icon on your Chrome toolbar.
Enter: Add the websites you wish to block in the list.
Save: Save your changes.
Browse Worry-Free: Any tab that navigates to a blocked site will automatically close.
Privacy Pledge

Your privacy is our top concern. We don’t collect, store, or transmit any data related to your browsing activities. Your block list stays on your local machine, making Web Blocker a truly privacy-minded solution.

Take control of your web experience with Website Blocker today!
